author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

As reported in the github issue #25090 (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/25090#issuecomment-652605531) the CentralityProducer used in HI and pA runs is still a legacy module

This PR makes it a global module.

I profited also to add a fillDescription method to that producer, and a few member variables and configuration parameters were renamed to follow the CMS standards for them

#### PR validation:

A few HI workflows run without error
title: Make CentralityProducer a global module
